None.Name: Teleport Station
None.Description: Activate to build a teleport station near an own ground unit. Once the station has been built own and friendly units can enter either of them to be teleported between the two spots. Only one teleport station can be built. Cannot be prevented by spellblocking abilities.

None.Name: Explosive Death
None.Description: If the teleport station is destroyed it will also make the portal explode dealing 3000 damage to hostile and friendly entities in a 20m radius, up to 12000 in total. Knocks back small and medium units.
